alert.note: Alert for Butler; Choctaw; Clarke; Conecuh; Crenshaw; Monroe; Washington; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 27 at 2:59PM CDT until September 28 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR STONE & GEORGE COUNTIES IN MISSISSIPPI, MOBILE, BALDWIN, ESCAMBIA, AND CONECUH COUNTIES IN ALABAMA, AND ALL OF THE WESTERN FLORIDA PANHANDLE DUE TO A COMBINATION OF LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES, 20 FOOT WINDS AROUND 15 MPH, AND HIGH KBDI/ERC VALUES... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 7 PM CDT WEDNESDAY FOR THE ENTIRE REGION DUE TO A COMBINATION OF LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES, 20 FOOT WINDS AROUND 15 MPH, AND HIGH KBDI/ERC VALUES... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 7 PM CDT WEDNESDAY FOR SOUTHWEST AND SOUTH CENTRAL ALABAMA DUE TO A COMBINATION OF LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES, 20 FOOT WINDS BETWEEN 15 TO 25 MPH AND HIGH KBDI/ERC VALUES... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 051, 052, 053, 054, 055, 056, 057, 058, 067, 075 and 076. * WINDS...North 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 20 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Butler; Choctaw; Clarke; Conecuh; Crenshaw; Monroe; Washington; Wilcox
